title: Will US COVID-19 Deaths Be Double the Number of US Vietnam War Deaths by Fall 2020?
subtitle: According to one estimate, the COVID-19 pandemic may leave as many as 300,000 Americans dead by end of 2020.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The total number of COVID-19 deaths in the U.S. will be double the American death toll from the Vietnam War by fall 2020.
